com.artifex.solib

Interface SOClipboardHandler


  • public interface SOClipboardHandler
    This interface specifies the basis for implementing a class to handle clipboard actions for the document editor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean clipboardHasPlaintext()
      This method ascertains whether the clipboard has any data.
      java.lang.String getPlainTextFromClipoard()
      This method returns the contents of the clipboard.
      void initClipboardHandler(android.app.Activity activity)
      This method initializes the clipboard handler
      void putPlainTextToClipboard(java.lang.String text)
      This method passes a string, cut or copied from the document, to be stored in the clipboard.

    • Method Detail

      • putPlainTextToClipboard

        void putPlainTextToClipboard(java.lang.String text)
        This method passes a string, cut or copied from the document, to be stored in the clipboard.
        Parameters:
        text - The text to be stored in the clipboard.

      • getPlainTextFromClipoard

        java.lang.String getPlainTextFromClipoard()
        This method returns the contents of the clipboard.
        Returns:
        The text stored in the clipboard.

      • clipboardHasPlaintext

        boolean clipboardHasPlaintext()
        This method ascertains whether the clipboard has any data.
        Returns:
        True if it has. False otherwise.

      • initClipboardHandler

        void initClipboardHandler(android.app.Activity activity)
        This method initializes the clipboard handler
        Parameters:
        activity - the context
